subject: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Monmouth Park may not be as famous as Churchill Downs, as stylish as Saratoga or as big as Belmont Park, but there is something about the place that everybody seems to like.
snippet: Monmouth Park may not be as famous as Churchill Downs, as stylish as Saratoga or as big as Belmont Park, but there is something about the place that everybody seems to like.
